content: That's really helpful. I'll definitely reach out to the local workforce development agency to explore these opportunities. Do you know if they also provide assistance with finding childcare or other support services that can help me balance my job training and family responsibilities? We have two young children, and it's been a challenge adjusting to our new life in the US since we left Turkey and received the news that our application was approved and we were going to be resettled in the United States.
